subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rangers presumably offered Cliff Lee less than the Yankees’ seven-year, $140 million deal, but if Texas increased its offer, the lefty could re-sign without leaving too much money on the table.
snippet: The Rangers presumably offered Cliff Lee less than the Yankees’ seven-year, $140 million deal, but if Texas increased its offer, the lefty could re-sign without leaving too much money on the table.
